value:
$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Princess Reginn... The crown.
It's yours now.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The Crown of the Dvergar...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The false king is no more. With Fáfnir
gone, you are free to ascend as the
queen of Niðavellir.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...I know. But I'm not ready yet.$k$pThere's still something I have
left to do.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Right. Let's go see Eitri.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Eitri, dear... It has been some time,
hasn't it? Old age suits you! You've
only gotten cuter, it seems.$k$pDo you really think what you're doing
now is the best use of your time?
The Askrans are on their way...$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Ah, Loki... It all makes sense now.
You're the one who put that idea
in Fáfnir's head.$k$p$EFace_Smile|...Not that it matters one way or the
other. In fact, you may have saved
me some trouble.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Cool|I have no idea what you're talking
about, of course.$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|I'm sure. Nevertheless, thank you
all the same. With the power you
gave me, I've kept this realm safe.$k$pAnd the successor to the royal family
still lives. My dreams have never been
closer to reality.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Successor? That princess, you mean?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Yes, and Fáfnir's dominion—and the
nightmare that began with the coup
all those years ago...is at its end.$k$p$EFace_Smile2|It is the birth of a new Niðavellir...
Does it have your blessing?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Hm... I suppose. Of course, who can
say what the future may hold...$k$p$Sbs150|
